Uses of Class
javafe.filespace.Query

Packages that use Query
javafe.filespace   
javafe.reader   
 

Uses of Query in javafe.filespace
 

Subclasses of Query in javafe.filespace
 class SlowQuery
          This module implements the Query "interface" by using the Java filespace classes (ClassPath, PathComponent, etc.) provided by the javafe.filespace package.
 

Uses of Query in javafe.reader
 

Fields in javafe.reader declared as Query
 Query StandardTypeReader.javaFileSpace
          Our (non-null) Query engine for determining the GenericFiles for files that belong to Java packages.
 Query StandardTypeReader.javaSrcFileSpace
           
 

Methods in javafe.reader that return Query
static Query StandardTypeReader.queryFromClasspath(java.lang.String path)
          Create a Query for use in creating a StandardTypeReader from a Java classpath.
 

Methods in javafe.reader with parameters of type Query
static StandardTypeReader StandardTypeReader.make(Query Q, Query sourceQ, PragmaParser pragmaP)
          Create a StandardTypeReader from a query engine and a pragma parser.
static StandardTypeReader StandardTypeReader.make(Query engine, Query srcEngine, Reader srcReader, Reader binReader)
          Create a StandardTypeReader from a query engine, a source reader, and a binary reader.
 

Constructors in javafe.reader with parameters of type Query
StandardTypeReader(Query engine, Query srcEngine, CachedReader srcReader, CachedReader binReader)
          Create a StandardTypeReader from a query engine, a source reader, and a binary reader.
